topComments.author: S Russell
topComments.comment: Our group of 5 just finished our open water certification with Jason and it was a fabulous experience! I had equalization issues and Jason guided me through the descents so I could enjoy the experience!! I would highly recommend Belize Pro Dive Center and Jason as an instructor!!

topComments.author: Paris Eastside

Em suma, tivemos a sorte de mergulhar em alguns locais maravilhosos do mundo (Hava√≠, Taiti, Porto Rico, M√©xico...) e ontem foi o passeio que mais gostei, pois Felix conseguiu me fazer esquecer meu medo. Reservaria novamente com eles em um piscar de olhos.  (Original) We had the most fantastic experience snorkeling yesterday with BPDC. All in all, we have been lucky enough to snorkel in some wonderful locations in the world (Hawaii, Tahiti, Puerto rico, Mexico...) and yesterday was the tour I enjoyed the most as Felix managed to get me to forget about my fear. Would book again with them in a heartbeat.

(Original) The people working here were AMAZING! So kind, helpful and happy! We finished certification here and had the most amazing teachers! Every single employee were such hard workers! topComments.author: BETH Knott

(Original) If I were ever to open a dive shop, I'd mimic Belize Pro. Their customer service is amazing for an island co as they memorized our names, gear,  and abilities immediately. He perfectly blended instruction with fun.  Ask for him especially if getting a certification although all dive masters on boat seemed great. Will be back!

(Original) With all of the dive shops on Ambergris Caye we had a very hard time choosing who to go with. We had a group of 7 people and 3 of them needed to get Open Water certified. As an added bonus they even pick you up and drop you off at the closest dock to where you are staying.

topComments.author: Ramzi B.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu tenho √°guas abertas certificadas por este centro. Meu instrutor, Luis, foi muito profissional e encorajador. Eu terminei todos os meus exames, piscina e 4 mergulhos em √°guas abertas em um dia e meio. Eles foram muito flex√≠veis em me agendar. Voc√™ basicamente sai em seus mergulhos de certifica√ß√£o com o passeio dispon√≠vel naquele dia e ter√° seu pr√≥prio instrutor. Fiz outra turn√™ com eles. √âramos seis mergulhadores e t√≠nhamos dois mestres de mergulho, outro Luis e Carlos. Eles foram pacientes, prestativos, encorajadores e informativos. Meu √∫nico problema foi o sistema de pagamento. Eles insistiram em um formul√°rio de autoriza√ß√£o de cart√£o de cr√©dito onde voc√™ preenche todas as suas informa√ß√µes confidenciais (aparentemente muito comum em Belize). Entendo a import√¢ncia de um dep√≥sito para confirmar uma reserva e confio no neg√≥cio deles, mas este √© um sistema de pagamento n√£o criptografado inseguro. Voc√™ precisa de um sistema de pagamento criptografado seguro para administrar um neg√≥cio. Recusei-me a preencher o formul√°rio e insisti em dinheiro. Eles aceitaram. As senhoras do balc√£o de servi√ßo foram sempre simp√°ticas e prest√°veis.  (Original) I got open water certified by this center. My instructor, Luis, was very professional and encouraging. I finished all my exams, pool and 4 open water dives in one day and a half. They were very flexible with scheduling me. You basically go out on your certification dives with the available tour on that day and you will have your own instructor. I went on another tour with them. We were six divers and had two dive masters, another Luis and Carlos. They were patient, helpful, encouraging and informative. My only issue was the payment system. They insisted on a creditcard authorization form where you fill out all your sensitive information (apparently very common in Belize). I understand the importance of a deposit to confirm a booking, and I trust their business, but this is an insecure unencrypted payment system. You need a secure encrypted payment system to run a business. I refused to fill out the form and insisted on cash. They accepted. The ladies at the service desk were always helpful and friendly.

topComments.author: Ashley Sickles
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nossa equipe foi incr√≠vel! Os rapazes garantiram que vimos tartarugas marinhas e tubar√µes incr√≠veis ü¶à durante o mergulho. topComments.author: Mariana Valencia

Foi um dos destaques de toda a viagem. Altamente recomend√°vel reservar este passeio.  (Original) We did the all day summer bbq tour and we could not recommend it enough. The snorkeling was amazing and the fishing even better. Our favorite part was the crew taking us to a deserted island where they cooked us the best meal we had the whole trip. After lunch we went swimming with sharks. It was one of the highlights of the entire trip. Highly recommend booking this tour.

topComments.author: Colin McDonald

(Original) Very professional and every employee just seems to be the nicest person ever. All employees are local and really seem to enjoy their job. Just a whole crew of characters. All of our dives were great highlighted by our day trip to Turneffe! When I come back to Belize I will definitely be diving with this outfit!

topComments.author: Monica Evans
topComments.comment: Spoiled is an understatement, the crew a Belize Pro Dive Center is top-notch and I've never had another dive shop treat us as well! So much fun to have on the boat, knowledgeable about the marine life and area, safety above all, and accommodating to our large group. When I go back to Belize, they're the first and only stop for my diving :)

topComments.author: Mike Huffaker
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Belize pro mergulho √© excelente. Eles s√£o muito preocupados com a seguran√ßa. O equipamento de aluguel est√° em muito boa forma. Os mestres de mergulho est√£o sempre verificando os mergulhadores e encontrando animais realmente interessantes. Os barcos est√£o abertos, ent√£o a entrada na √°gua √© um retrocesso. Eles coletam / desembarcam no p√≠er perto de onde voc√™ est√° hospedado, o que resolve um problema log√≠stico real em Ambergris Caye. Eles t√™m tanques de 80 e 100 c/ft. Atravessar o recife em dire√ß√£o ao mar e as ondas dos pontos de mergulho pode ser dif√≠cil, portanto, se voc√™ precisar delas, tome seus rem√©dios para enjoo antes da hora anterior ao mergulho. Eu n√£o usei uma roupa de mergulho, pois a temperatura da √°gua era de 84 graus/F. Consegui algumas pequenas picadas de √°gua-viva em um mergulho, mas n√£o o suficiente para vestir minha roupa de mergulho no pr√≥ximo mergulho. Eu nunca tive frio.  (Original) Belize pro dive is excellent. They are very safety conscious. The rental gear is in very good shape. The dive masters are always checking on the divers and finding really interesting animals. The boats are open so water entry is a back roll. They pickup/drop-off at the pier near where you are staying which solves a real logistical problem in Ambergris Caye. They have both 80 and 100 c/ft tanks. Crossing the reef seaward and the dive spots waves can be rough so if you will need them take your seasickness pills before the hour before the dive. I did not use a wetsuit since the water temperature was 84 degrees/F. I did get a few minor jellyfish stings on one dive but not enough to don my wetsuit for the next dive. I was never cold.

topComments.author: Angella Jones
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Mergulhamos em Belize pela primeira vez em dezembro. Normalmente procuramos uma loja de mergulho que s√≥ aceita pequenos grupos de mergulho. Nosso amigo recomendou esta empresa. Tamb√©m quer√≠amos terminar nossa certifica√ß√£o avan√ßada de √°guas abertas. √Ä primeira vista, pensei que se tratava de uma grande empresa "Espero que n√£o sejamos apenas um n√∫mero para eles", bem, n√£o √©ramos. Eles superaram nossas expectativas de longe! Bernie (instrutor de mergulho) passou dois dias conosco e finalizou nossa certifica√ß√£o. Ele era profissional, qualificado e divertido. Jonathan (Dive Master) nos levou os √∫ltimos 2 dias de mergulho. Ele era qualificado e seguro. Ambos personalizaram nossos mergulhos de acordo com a nossa necessidade. Temos mergulhado em muitos lugares e n√£o experimentamos nada al√©m do servi√ßo incr√≠vel do pessoal excelente que nos registrou para a tripula√ß√£o de mergulho e capit√£es de barco. Cuidaram de tudo com trabalho em equipe e um sorriso. Eu os recomendaria com certeza e gostaria que todas as empresas fossem t√£o atenciosas! Eles s√£o o √∫nico grupo com quem eu mergulharia em San Pedro. Angie e lorenzo  (Original) We dived Belize for the first time December. We usually look for a dive shop that only takes small dive groups. Our friend recommended this company. We also wanted to finish up our advanced open water certification. At first impression, I thought this is a large company "I hope we are not just a number to them", well we weren't. They exceeded our expectations by far!  Bernie (Dive Instructor) spent two days with us and finished up our certification. He was professional, knowledgable and fun. Jonathan (Dive Master) took us the last 2 days of diving. He was knowledgable and safe. They both customized our dives to suit us. We have been diving many places and we experienced nothing but amazing service from the great folks who checked us in to the dive crew and boat captains. They took care of everything with teamwork and a smile. I would absolutely recommend them and wish all companies were as attentive! They are the only group I would dive with on San Pedro. Angie and Lorenzo

topComments.author: Courtney Wilemon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meu marido e eu acabamos de mergulhar 5 dias com o Belize Pro Dive Center. Se voc√™ est√° procurando um centro de mergulho em San Pedro, n√£o procure mais! Este √© o lugar. Todos os funcion√°rios aqui s√£o gentis, prestativos e profissionais. Antes da viagem, a comunica√ß√£o era √≥tima e os e-mails eram respondidos com muita rapidez e efici√™ncia. Na chegada, Catherine e suas meninas na recep√ß√£o o recebem com um sorriso e o ajudam da maneira que podem. Os divemasters s√£o maravilhosos, pacientes e divertidos. A seguran√ßa √© uma prioridade. Mergulhamos com Jason, Jonathan, Dimas e Luis. Sempre nos sentimos bem cuidados e seguros. Eles lidaram com tudo e foram al√©m para garantir que tiv√©ssemos a melhor experi√™ncia poss√≠vel. Os capit√£es dos barcos tamb√©m merecem um grito. Tony e Marciano s√£o pilotos experientes e realmente cuidam de todos a bordo. Os locais de mergulho eram inacredit√°veis!! O Atol Turneffe √© lindo, o Blue Hole √© uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel, o Lighthouse Atoll ao redor do Blue Hole √© cheio de vida e os recifes locais s√£o uma del√≠cia. O mergulho aqui √© de primeira qualidade e superou em muito nossas expectativas. Os recifes t√™m tanta vida!! Eu n√£o posso recomendar o Belize Pro Dive Center o suficiente! Eles s√£o maravilhosos!!  (Original) My husband and I just finished diving 5 days with Belize Pro Dive Center. If you are searching for a dive center in San Pedro, look no further! This is the place. All the staff here are kind, helpful, and professional. Prior to the trip, communication was great, and emails were responded to very quickly and efficiently. Upon arrival, Catherine and her girls at the desk greet you with a smile and help you in any way they can. The divemasters are wonderful, patient, and fun. Safety is a priority. We dove with Jason, Jonathan, Dimas, and Luis. We always felt well taken care of and safe. They handled everything and went above and beyond to make sure we had the best experience possible. The boat captains deserve a shout out too. Tony and Marciano are expert drivers and really take care of everyone on board. The dive sites were unbelievable!! Turneffe Atoll is beautiful, the Blue Hole is an amazing experience, the Lighthouse Atoll around the Blue Hole is full of life, and the local reefs are a delight. The diving here is top notch and far exceeded our expectations. The reefs have so much life!! I cannot recommend Belize Pro Dive Center enough! They are wonderful!!

Estou genuinamente muito grato pela equipe e pela loja, pois eles fizeram da minha viagem tudo o que eu esperava que fosse. Um grito especial para as senhoras na frente, Joe, Luis x2. N√£o posso dizer coisas positivas o suficiente.  (Original) Belize pro dive centre is such an incredible place filled with such incredible people. Went solo to ambergris caye for 11 nights, completed 13+ dives, and had the most amazing time of my life. I‚Äôm genuinely so grateful for the staff and the shop as they made my trip everything I hoped it‚Äôd be. Special shout out to the ladies at the front, Joe, Luis x2. You‚Äôre all incredible and I‚Äôll definitely be back. Thank you for everything. I‚Äôm very grateful for my experience and being able to share it with such wonderful people. Can‚Äôt say enough positive things.

topComments.author: Shan Yong
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meu marido e eu est√°vamos hospedados no hotel Alaia, que fica ao lado dessa roupa de mergulho. Depois de uma falta de brilho e mergulho n√£o seguro em Caye Caulker (a loja de mergulho n√£o se incomodou com QUALQUER PAPELADA e aceitou nossa palavra de que √©ramos mergulhadores), n√£o t√≠nhamos grandes expectativas para o Belize Pro Dive Center. Decidimos us√°-los, pois estavam ao lado do hotel. Ficamos absolutamente impressionados com o n√≠vel de servi√ßo, aten√ß√£o aos detalhes, as medidas de seguran√ßa, os mergulhos e como toda a roupa foi executada em geral. Eles nos trouxeram para Turneffe para 3 mergulhos por um dia inteiro e, posteriormente, fizemos um mergulho local de 2 dias. Meu marido, que mergulha h√° 20 anos, disse que este foi o melhor n√≠vel de servi√ßo que ele recebeu de uma loja de mergulho. Eu concordaria. Seus equipamentos eram de primeira qualidade. Eles trouxeram 16 mergulhadores e fizeram muitos backups caso as coisas dessem errado. Nosso mestre de mergulho Lewis/Louis teve grande aten√ß√£o aos detalhes. Se algo estivesse um pouco errado, digamos que o tanque do meu marido estivesse um pouco mais baixo no ar e todos n√≥s sab√≠amos que ele ficaria bem, Lewis/Louis insistiu em troc√°-lo. Eu apreciei. Eu gostava de como eles ajudavam com o equipamento, verificavam tudo duas vezes, NUNCA o apressavam e certificavam-se de que voc√™ estava confort√°vel. Uma vez que Lewis/Louis ouviu de meu marido que eu costumava usar ar muito rapidamente, ele imediatamente pegou outra boia infl√°vel para mim no caso de eu ter que emergir primeiro. Sem julgamento, apenas gentileza e ele tamb√©m me deu conselhos sobre como durar mais tempo abaixo da superf√≠cie. Eles nunca prometeram demais e apenas entregaram resultados. A comida/lanches/bebidas a bordo eram mais do que suficientes. Os 5 mergulhos com eles foram incr√≠veis. Vimos tubar√µes, tartarugas, arraias, lindos corais, e eles realmente se importaram em mostrar e escrever coisas em seu quadro subaqu√°tico. Eu posso estar apenas delirando agora, mas eu estava t√£o impressionado com eles. Meu marido disse que ficaria no hotel da pr√≥xima vez por causa deles em vez de vice-versa. Bottomline, apenas reserve seus mergulhos com eles, voc√™ n√£o ficar√° desapontado. Seus pre√ßos podem ser um pouco mais altos do que outras lojas de mergulho em San Pedro, mas valem a pena se voc√™ se preocupa com qualidade, servi√ßo, seguran√ßa e divers√£o. Gostaria de voltar e tamb√©m exorto quem est√° lendo este coment√°rio para experiment√°-los. Eles n√£o v√£o decepcionar e merecem ser apoiados. A equipe da recep√ß√£o e toda a equipe de suporte tamb√©m foram incr√≠veis. Belize Pro Dive - n√≥s definitivamente o veremos novamente!!!  Data da experi√™ncia: fevereiro de 2022  (Original) My husband and I were staying at Alaia hotel which is right next to this dive outfit. After a lack luster and non safe dive in Caye Caulker (dive shop didn't bother with ANY PAPERWORK and took our word that we were divers), we did not have high expectations for Belize Pro Dive Center. We decided to use them as they were right next to the hotel. We were absolutely blown away by the level of service, attention to detail, the safety measures, the dives and just how the whole outfit was run in general. They brought us out to Turneffe for 3 dives for a full day and then subsequently, we did a 2 day local dive. My husband who has been diving for 20 years, said this was the best level of service he got from a dive shop ever. I would agree. Their equipment was top notch. They brought 16 divers out and had many back ups in the event things went wrong. Our dive master Lewis/Louis had great attention to detail. If something was slightly off, say my husband's tank was slightly lower in air and we all knew he would be fine, Lewis/Louis insisted on changing it out. I appreciated it. I liked how they would help with gear, check everything twice, NEVER ever rushed you and made sure you were comfortable. Once Lewis/Louis heard from my husband I usually used air pretty quickly, he immediately took another inflatable floatie for me in the event I would have to surface first. No judgement, just kindness and he also gave me advice on how to last longer below the surface. They never over-promised and just delivered results. The food/snacks/drinks on board were more than sufficient. The 5 dives with them were amazing. We saw sharks, turtles, rays, beautiful coral, and they actually cared to show you and write things on their underwater board. I might be just raving now but I was so impressed with them. My husband said he would stay at the hotel next time because of them instead of vice versa. Bottomline, just book your dives with them, you will not be disappointed. Their prices might be a wee bit higher than other dive shops in San Pedro but they are worth if if you care for quality, service, safety and fun. I would go back and also urge anyone who is reading this review to try them out. They will not disappoint and deserve to be supported. Front desk staff and all the support staff were also awesome. Belize Pro Dive - we will definitely see you again!!!  Date of experience: February 2022
